steps.title: 1. Connect your sources
steps.description: Securely connect your team’s tools—like Slack, Google Workspace, and Microsoft 365. The graph is built in the background, respecting all existing permissions.

steps.title: 2. Ask your question
steps.description: Use natural language or our API to find the shortest path to anyone. Our AI ranks paths by strength, so you always get the warmest intro.

steps.title: 3. Act on the answer
steps.description: Request an intro, copy a blurb for your team, or explore alternative paths. The graph makes your network actionable.

privacy.heading: Enterprise-grade privacy & security.
privacy.explainer: We provide the controls and compliance you need to operate securely. Your data is yours, always.

checklist.title: SOC 2 Type II Certified
checklist.description: Our systems and processes are regularly audited and validated by third-party experts to ensure we meet the highest standards for security, availability, and confidentiality.

checklist.title: GDPR & CCPA Compliant
checklist.description: We are fully compliant with major data privacy regulations, providing you with the tools and guarantees needed to manage data subject rights and international data transfers.

checklist.title: Encryption at Rest & In-Transit
checklist.description: All data, whether stored in our databases or moving between services, is encrypted using industry-standard AES-256 encryption to prevent unauthorized access.

checklist.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
checklist.description: Fine-grained permissions allow you to control exactly who can see and do what within your organization's graph, ensuring data is only accessible to authorized personnel.

checklist.title: Data Portability & Deletion
checklist.description: You have complete control over your data. We provide simple tools for exporting your entire graph or permanently deleting all associated information from our systems upon request.

logos.name: Google Workspace
